arts.ttl: Bradford miss chance to go top of League Two after defeat at Gillingham
arts.sum: Conor Masterson’s first goal for nearly a year was enough to separate the sides.

Gillingham's 3-1 defeat to Newport on Tuesday night was another dismal result for a Gills side who have underperformed this season. They have won just one of their last 13 games. Bradford City are no...
